Articles.Content: My medic ubercharges the knight.
My paddle swings over and bounces the knight back at the other side.
I catch the knight and begin a rush to see if I can score a touchdown.
Great save by Luongo! Who passes the puck, er, pawn up to the wing..
The Axiom lands back on Earth, and the people are restoring the planet.
I reprogram the Axiom's autopilot for a nice game of Global Thermonuclear War.
Thankfully, M.A.D. prevents you from actually pressing the button. In the meantime, I'm launching pumpkins at your side with a large Punkin' Chunkin' air cannon.
I return fire with United Flingdom. Centrifugal all the way
I attempt to bore your side to death with explanations of why it's only "centrifugal" if you're the projectile.
I counter with a long-drawn-out explanation of the feeding habits of sea sponges
Who cares about feeding habits? I soak the sponges and load them into a giant catapult to win the water fight.
Good thing my Queen never forgets her towel. She HitchHikes behind the pawn line
Too bad that the car she hitchhiked in was from Crazy Taxi. I end up swerving into a bunch of your pieces on the way to get her to the pawn line.
Because one of them was an undercover cop, you get three stars and the taxi is pursued by the police sports cars and helicopter.
I jump an open drawbridge to lose the cop car, and at apogee I use a rocket launcher on the chopper. Then I land on your bishop.
I loaded the bishop with high explosive.

The explosion from the bishop was at such a magnitude that it rips a hole in space-time, sucking the other team in. In the aftermath, my king declares victory, before time freezes a few seconds later.

The universe no longer moves.

1 minute ago, Dobelong said:

The explosion from the bishop was at such a magnitude that it rips a hole in space-time, sucking the other team in. In the aftermath, my king declares victory, before time freezes a few seconds later.

The universe no longer moves.

Space-time does not work like that, the board is restored to normalcy, but the bishops explosion was contained, and as such only it was lost. (a bit fried).

My bishop was a little burned, but I send my Bishop screaming across the board at high speed, armed with a mini gun the size of a VW bug. 

Edited June 29, 2016 by Lo Var Lachland
My heavy laughs at your puny minigun.
Now it's my turn to take the mic, and the heavy might have chuckled at your joke of a joke but the entire audience laughs at my stand-up comedy performance. I'm sure to win the award.
Unfortunately for you, my pawn activates its power up, and performs a Ultra Super Beam attack on the your king, thus distracting everyone from your little comedy.
SL1 tosses smoke, while my commander calls in arty behind the point. Check.

Oh, so sorry, but the king...

ISN'T THERE.

He's in your base,

KILLING YOUR PIECES.

KILLING. YOUR. PIECES.

Edited September 16, 2016 by MDZhB
I play Jace, Memory Adept, and activate his 0 ability. The top ten cards of your library go into your graveyard!
